Portal 2 - одна з найкращих ігор Valve. Круті головоломки, повноцінна кампанія для кооперативу, карти користувачів і модифікації. Все це коштує цих грошей. А якщо в вас навіть цих грошей нема, то завжди є розпродаж і 90% знижка.
Люблю Portal 2, і вертатись в нього час від часу. Так і награв 50 годин)

If you like puzzles, humor, and robots dying mercilessly for no reason, then this is the game for you. A sequel that exceeds all expectations and makes you laugh as you try to solve difficult challenges.
This game is a Classic, if you haven't played it, you really, really should. If only to hear GLaDOS' voice mocking you as her turrets shoot you to death with their lasers!
Um clássico, extremamente divertido e emocionante. Um jogo perfeito!

Totalmente recomendado para los amante de los puzzles ;)

Perfect continuation of the first Portal game and another perfect game implementation into the Valve universe. Must play for any Valve fan of course and its awesome to play the co-op with people who haven't played portal before and don't know/understand the game mechanics initially. It's cool to show them around and here/see them begin to understand how everything works. Really cool addition!

Portal 2. O melhor jogo que já joguei, com certeza. O game tem um tipo de humor sádico que se assemelha a sátiras. Personagens espetaculares. Depois de jogar toda a campanha 4 vezes, digo que o que sinto jogando esse jogo é algo único.

Juegazo, donde entran en juego las físicas de portales que deberemos estrujar nuestra cabeza para averiguar como avanzar en cada zona, te tendrá atrapado de principio a fin. Además cuenta con un modo cooperativo y la posibllidad de bajar mapas del workshop creados por la comunidad, con lo que añade horas de entretenimiento.

Gráficos: 8
Sonido: 9
Jugabilidad: 9
Duración: 8
______________
Nota: 9 / 10

Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis The Wise? I thought not. It's not a story the Jedi would tell you. It's a Sith legend. Darth Plagueis was a Dark Lord of the Sith, so powerful and so wise he could use the Force to influence the midichlorians to create life… He had such a knowledge of the dark side that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying. The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. He became so powerful… the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught his apprentice everything he knew, then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.
